name: Merging with Demon Spirits
summary: Lin Feng travels back to 21 years ago, the day all high school students have the chance to integrate with demon spirits. Based on his last life knowledge, he chooses a precious demon spirit which can accelerate his cultivation. However, his soul power is too weak to control this demon spirit; he needs to find a way to deal with it...
author: Sweet potato
